title: nf-core/genomeassembler pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided, has to be a string value and cannot contain spaces

ontreads.errorMessage: ONT reads cannot contain spaces, has to exist and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

hifireads.errorMessage: HiFi reads cannot contain spaces, has to exist and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

ref_fasta.errorMessage: Reference fasta cannot contain spaces, has to exist and must have extension '.fa', '.fna' or '.fasta'

ref_gff.errorMessage: Reference gff cannot contain spaces, has to exist and must have extension '.gff' or '.gff3'

shortread_F.errorMessage: shortread_F cannot contain spaces, has to exist and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

shortread_R.errorMessage: shortread_R cannot contain spaces, has to exist and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

paired.errorMessage: paired must be true or false.
